name: LIG Party
description:
LIG Party was a game made for the purpose of a tournament for the LIG association.

It's made for two players cooperating to make the most points on four mini games played in a row.

To access the game, paste this code on the title screen : LIGTournament

Controls

Player 1: ZQSD / Spacebar

Player 2: ↑←↓→ / Shift

The Team

Game Designer / Artist: Gaëtan Perré-Moutier

Game Programmers: Ema Ouardi - Tom Segaux - Kévin Verhaeghe
